synopsis.text: Ye Feng is a genius alchemist who breaks free from the shackles of heaven and earth to reach an incredible cultivation level. However, he is betrayed by his seniors and attacked, though he manages to consume a Divine Realm pill before seemingly dying. 500 years later, Ye Feng awakens in the body of his descendant, also named Ye Feng. Now inhabiting a new era, Ye Feng resolves to save his lineage and take revenge on those who betrayed him all those years ago. He embarks once more on the path of cultivation, working tirelessly to regain and surpass his previous mastery over alchemy and martial arts. As he grows in strength across the Cloud Illusory Continent, Ye Feng also seeks clues regarding the mysterious Divine Realm pill and the secrets behind the way of heaven. With continuous astonishing effort and innate talent, Ye Feng becomes renowned in all nine continents for defying the limits of mortal men. His legendary journey pits him against the supreme forces of the realms as he battles to expose the truth from 500 years past. This blood-pumping tale follows an unorthodox emperor seeking justice on the road to the Divine Realm.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
